subject: Tracking order #SSN3931
description_text:
Good morning

I made an order with SimSonn and I got two tracking numbers.
I already received the parts from one of the tracking numbers but the other
one still reports being in the airport but is oversized/overweight since
the forth of December.
The tracking number in question is:
https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047115288819

Can you please help me with this situaction as I dont know if the package
is stuck or is already coming.

conversations.body_text: Hi Goncalo Costa,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. I am currently contacting the logistics provider to investigate the matter on your behalf. We will arrange for a replacement shipment as soon as possible.

Hello

I noticed that the package as returned to your instalations. Is the new
package on the way, and if it is how much time will it take to arrive and
what is the tracking number?


service@simsonn.com
Hi Goncalo Costa,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELV1708582704YQ
